mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WAREHOUSE_LOCATION (location_name, rack, bay, level_position, width, depth, height) VALUES ( #{locationName}, #{rack}, #{bay}, #{levelPosition}, #{width}, #{depth}, #{height} )

INSERT INTO OUTBOUND_ORDER ( outbound_order_idx, franchise_idx, status, requested_date, expect_outbound_date ) VALUES ( #{outboundOrderIdx}, #{franchiseIdx}, #{status}, #{requestedDate}, #{expectOutboundDate} )
